page.title: 08THE PUB AT RODINGTON
page.content: A LANDLORD HAS A VERY DEMANDING JOB. THE PUB IS OPEN FROM 12 NOON TILL 2 P.M. AND FROM 7 TILL 10.30 P.M.ON SUNDAYS. FOR THE REST OF THE WEEK THE PUB OPENS FROM 12 NOON TILL 2.30 P.M. AND FROM 7 TILL 11 P.M. ON BANK HOLIDAYS THERE IS AN AUTOMATIC EXTENSION TILL 11.30 P.M. AT WEEK-ENDS THERE ARE ABOUT 100 PEOPLE IN THE BAR WHICH IS FAIRLY CROWDED. THE BUSIEST NIGHT OF THE WEEK IN THE LOUNGE IS THURSDAYS. THE LANDLORD THINKS THIS IS BECAUSE THURSDAY IS PAY DAY. THE QUIETEST NIGHTS ARE MONDAYS (WHEN THE LANDLORD HAS HIS DAY OFF) AND WEDNESDAYS. THEY SERVE MEALS EVERY DAY, BOTH AT LUNCH TIME AND IN THE EVENING. THIS INCREASES BUSINESS BECAUSE PEOPLE ARE PREPARED TO TRAVEL REASONABLE DISTANCES WHICH THEY WOULD NOT FOR JUST A DRINK.
